START_TOUR_TEXT: Welcome to the tutorial of Eurostat's energy balance visualisation tool. This guided tour will show you the main ways of interacting with the tool. You can find a more detailed documentation on the Energy balance page.
TUTO_2: The tool contains a menu for additional features. Click on the menu icon to customize the chart.
TUTO_4: Use this option to access the tutorial, metadata, or send feedback.
TUTO_6: Use this option to download a picture or data.
TUTO_8: Use this button to embed the chart in other tools.
TUTO_10: Use this option to expand the flows of the energy balance table.
TUTO_12: Use this option to visualise the data of the energy balance table using pie charts, bar charts, or line charts.
TUTO_22: Sharing it with others on X (old Twitter), Facebook, email, and LinkedIn will help us improve our tool. Thank you!
END_TOUR_TITLE: That is it for our tour.
END_TOUR_TEXT:
All the images illustrating the definitions in this tool are coming from Unsplash or Pixabay.
If you find this visualisation tool useful, please share it with others using our social media buttons. Thank you!
